description: React component for submitting a vehicle breakdown request with form inputs, map preview, and validation.

methods.name: parseNumberOrNull
methods.description: Parses a string to a number or returns null if invalid.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates form inputs, including vehicle info, issue description, contact info, and optional coordinates.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, validation, and navigation after request creation.
